channel.title: I cant log into my server But every1 else can?
channel.description: Ok so me and my friend made a server on his computer and then he sent it to me cuz i can host 24/7. I portforwarded and set the firewall settings for tcp and udp and now when i turn it on everyone else can log in but i cant.... I can turn the server on and off cuz they all disconnect when i turn it off but why the hell cant i log in???? It just says error connecting to server. Please help? Thanks.

item.title: I cant log into my server But every1 else can?
item.dc:creator: @soccerjunki12 soccerjunki12
item.description:
@soccerjunki12 wrote:

ok if you are trying to connect throught it with your no-ip eg

Help.no-ip.org and your hosting it

it won’t let you

you will need to connect with 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 or localhost

Read full topic
item.source: I cant log into my server But every1 else can?

item.title: I cant log into my server But every1 else can?
item.dc:creator: @S_E_R_B S E R B
item.description:
@S_E_R_B wrote:

Ok so me and my friend made a server on his computer and then he sent it to me cuz i can host 24/7. I portforwarded and set the firewall settings for tcp and udp and now when i turn it on everyone else can log in but i cant… I can turn the server on and off cuz they all disconnect when i turn it off but why the hell cant i log in??? It just says error connecting to server. Please help? Thanks.

Read full topic
